attributes.action: Withdraw Britain from next years (2008) Eurovision Song Contest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: on the grounds that the voting system is totally unfair and biased, against Britain and biased (due to shear volume of entrants) "for" the numerous Eastern European satellite states, that have been created since the collapse of the USSR. This contest is no longer run in the feeling of fair play and  good natured competition that it was originated in 1956.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
